title: Riot please help!!!
body: Hello, i have a suggestion that would make league of legends better than it already it :) i think riot should add a 'SEND' button on chats like private chats, group chats, lobby chat, champion select chat, and in-game chat. i am suggesting this because i have an issue with communicating in this game. i have issues because i play on a macbook and one day my 'enter' key fells off, i lost it, and now i can't talk to my team when i am in game and it frustrates me because i don't want to tilt anybody with my constant pinging. please ADD a 'send' button of some sort to your game riot. PLEASE!!! <3

replies.body:
Ahck! Sorry to hear about your enter key; hope it can get fixed soon!

But I think that's a pretty good suggestion actually; something that might have been overlooked since normally folks just press enter all the time. The best place to make a suggestion like that is over in the [**client discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) channel. You may not get a response from a dev, but they do check the Boards constantly looking at feedback and for inspiration, and there might be others who feel the same about a send button and can start a discussion to get more attention to the idea. :)
